import React from "react"; import './App.css'; import NavBar from './components/NavBar/NavBar' import Profile from './components/Profile/Profile' import Home from './components/Content/Home' import About from './components/Content/About' import Resume from './components/Content/Resume' import Projects from './components/Content/Projects' import Contact from './components/Content/Contact' import { AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion" import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function App() { const location = useLocation(); return (
); } export default App;
